chapters.title: Chapter 17:  A Bronze Bear
chapters.info:
Lord Nasin Caeren,
      p. 379â€”Andoran
      noble, High Seat of House Caeren.  He gave
      Arymilla lodging during her attempts to take the
      Lion Throne.  He has thin white hair, and is stark raving mad.
      He believes himself betrothed to Elenia, despite the
      fact that she is married.
